CIPHER.166.cipherString: Media are a public good and must be supported to survive, if nothing else in the interest of democracy.
CIPHER.166.question: A quote by Audrey Gadzekpo has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.166.author: Audrey Gadzekpo

CIPHER.157.cipherString: When in doubt, win the trick.
CIPHER.157.question: Decode the following quote by Edmond Hoyle which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of FERN.
CIPHER.157.author: Edmond Hoyle

CIPHER.164.cipherString: In any case, we do not advance the human cause by refusing to consider ideas that make us frightened.
CIPHER.164.question: A quote by Carl Sagan has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told that the second word decodes to be “ANY”
CIPHER.164.author: Carl Sagan

CIPHER.144.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 6 21443 98675. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.161.cipherString: When the youth of America gets together, amazing things happen.
CIPHER.161.question: A quote by Tom Ford has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with WHENT.
CIPHER.161.author: Tom Ford

CIPHER.151.cipherString: Your conscience is the measure of the honesty of your selfishness.Listen to it carefully.
CIPHER.151.question: The following quote by Richard Bach needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of SOULED and polybius key of SOUNDTRACK.
CIPHER.151.author: Richard Bach

CIPHER.153.cipherString: Space or science fiction has become a dialect for our time.
CIPHER.153.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Doris Lessing using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.153.author: Doris Lessing

CIPHER.150.cipherString: I have a fear of being boring.
CIPHER.150.question: Decode the following quote by Christian Bale which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of PAID.
CIPHER.150.author: Christian Bale

CIPHER.165.cipherString: To Achieve What Nobody Else Has, You Must Do What Nobody Else Does
CIPHER.165.question: Some advice which has MUSTDO somewhere in it has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.165.author: Anonymous

CIPHER.145.cipherString: Life is a compromise of what your ego wants to do, what experience tells you to do, and what your nerves let you do.
CIPHER.145.question: A quote by Walter Bagehot has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K1 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.145.author: Walter Bagehot

CIPHER.148.cipherString: Happy is entirely up to you and always has been.
CIPHER.148.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Janette Rallison using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.148.author: Janette Rallison

CIPHER.158.cipherString: Puedes verlo, pero en realidad no está allí. Al igual que el final de un arco iris, el horizonte es una ilusión.
CIPHER.158.question: A quote by Holly Ringland which has been translated to Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.158.author: Holly Ringland
CIPHER.158.translation: You can see it, but it's not really there. Just like the end of a rainbow, the horizon is an illusion.

CIPHER.149.cipherString: A fruit that comes forth is the desire and joy for the labor of a farmer.
CIPHER.149.question: The following quote by Sunday Adelaja needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of LANDS and polybius key of DRAGONFLIES.
CIPHER.149.author: Sunday Adelaja

CIPHER.152.cipherString: Our adversaries think they confuse us by repeating their own opinion and paying no heed to ours.
CIPHER.152.question: A quote by Goethe has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K2 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.152.author: Goethe

CIPHER.159.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 028 85392 45167. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.156.cipherString: Be diligent to succeed as there is a way. Where there be no way, only the persistent and diligent find it.
CIPHER.156.question: A quote by Folorunsho Alakija has been encoded using the K3 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K3 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.156.author: Folorunsho Alakija

CIPHER.146.cipherString: A smile is the light in your window that tells others that there is a caring, sharing person inside.
CIPHER.146.question: A quote by Denis Waitley has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has TELLS somewhere in it.
CIPHER.146.author: Denis Waitley

CIPHER.160.cipherString: When a change occurs in Nature, the quantity of action necessary for that change is as small as possible.
CIPHER.160.question: Hard K2 Aristocrat without a Hint Quote Author: Pierre Louis Maupertuis
CIPHER.160.author: Pierre Louis Maupertuis

CIPHER.155.cipherString: Dreaming is the fuel in the car of dedication!
CIPHER.155.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Todd Stocker using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with DREAM
CIPHER.155.author: Todd Stocker

CIPHER.154.cipherString: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
CIPHER.154.question: A quote by Denis Waitley has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.154.author: Denis Waitley

CIPHER.163.cipherString: We would like to live as we once lived, but history will not permit it.
CIPHER.163.question: The following quote by John F. Kennedy needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of SHINE
CIPHER.163.author: John F. Kennedy

CIPHER.147.cipherString: If thee nacients left us idesa, ot oru credit eb it spoken, wee omderns are building houses for them.
CIPHER.147.question: A friend of yours tried to encode a quote by A. B. Alcott as an Aristocrat using a K2 alphabet.  Unfortunately for you they are both a terrible speller and typist.  What did they encode?
CIPHER.147.author: A. B. Alcott

CIPHER.162.cipherString: Unwinding a habit that you have allowed to entangle you can be difficult. But the power is in you. Do not despair.
CIPHER.162.question: A quote by Boyd K. Packer has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.162.author: Boyd K. Packer
